question:
Consider the following statements about the GRIHA Council:
  1. It is an initiative by Ministry of Environment & Forests (MoEF)
  2. It aims at promoting eco-friendly vehicles in the country
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. GRIHA is an acronym for Green Rating for Integrated Habitat Assessment. It is a Sanskrit word which means “Abode”. GRIHA Council is an independent platform for the interaction on scientific and administrative issues related to sustainable habitats in the Indian subcontinent. It was founded by TERI (The Energy and Resources Institute, New Delhi) with support from MNRE (Ministry of New and Renewable Energy, Government of India) along with a handful of experts in the sustainability of built environment from. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The council is mandated to promote the development of Green buildings and habitats in India through GRIHA.
